At this year's [AGU Fall Meeting](https://www.agu.org/fall-meeting) Dec 11 - 15, 2023, NASA Openscapes Mentors and collaborators will be giving learning workshops, talks, posters, demos, and more. We'll also have a Sunday Happy Hour and invite you to join us!

[**Our NASA-Openscapes Planning Doc**](https://github.com/NASA-Openscapes/2023-planning-agu/blob/main/README.md) has up-to-date information of our activities.


See also the [AGU Searchable Schedule](https://agu.confex.com/agu/fm23/meetingapp.cgi/Home/0). 

Have a great Fall Meeting and we hope to connect with you there.
